subNodes.conversationText: root

Ah, excellent!  This is indigo hallowscap.  It appears that the goblin shaman had been growing them--whether for his heathen rituals or recreation, though, I can't say.|***gc_is_in_combat-->NOT::True    String::gossam    ***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::Q_GREEN    String::5    |
I will harvest some of these, taking only what I need--but if you so wish, you can attempt to harvest some yourself--I can refine the extra into a powder of extraordinary capabilities.
[(Sleight of Hand) Attempt to harvest some of the indigo hallowscap yourself.]|***gc_check_class-->NOT::False Int::1 ***gc_check_class-->NOT::False Int::8 |

[You successfully harvest some of the indigo hallowscap yourself.]||***ga_give_xp-->Int::100 Int::0 ***ga_give_item-->String::mi_hallowscap Int::1 Int::0 ***gc_skill_dc-->NOT::False Int::21 Int::17 ||
[<i>Gossam secures the specimens he needs quite easily.<i>]|***ga_global_int-->String::greenthumb    String::++    |

Well, , we have found all of the plant specimens I'd set out to find. I knew it would be exciting, but I did not know how exciting. And now my little adventure has come to an end, I suppose.|***gc_global_int-->NOT::False String::greenthumb String::5 |
In all honesty, these specimens pale in comparison to what finding them has meant to me. You, Vroman, and Ianth have proven yourselves to be true friends.
It is an honor to hear you say so, son of Sheela Peryroyl. [Ianth bows deeply, and clasps Gossam's hand warmly.]
I would have to agree, Gossam.  I hope this does not actually mean that you are through with us!
Indeed.  Your contribution to this party has been most valuable.
I am glad that you think so, <FirstName>.
I don't intend to go.  I feel as if we are a part of something larger than all of us--by Sheela Peryroyl, my path is with you.
I am glad, Gossam.  Let us continue on.|***ga_journal-->String::Q_GREEN    Int::10    Int::0    Int::0    Int::0    ***ga_give_xp-->Int::1000    Int::0    |
Of course.  Let's go.|***ga_journal-->String::Q_GREEN    Int::10    Int::0    Int::0    Int::0    ***ga_give_xp-->Int::1000    Int::0    |
Gossam, you mustn't think of going!|***ga_global_int-->String::sympathetic String::++ ***ga_global_int-->String::gossam_inf String::++ |
[Chuckling.] How could I be deaf to such an earnest entreaty?
The decision is yours, of course.  But I would like to see you stay.
The decision is mine, it's true.  And I believe I have decided.
[Shrug.] It's up to you.|***ga_global_int-->String::abrasive String::++ |
[You botch your collection attempt.]
[(Survival) Attempt to harvest some of the indigo hallowscap yourself.]
